source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 	
AcctCode,
	AcctName,
	U_PORF_Dep  OverCode,
	U_PORF_Alloc OverCode2, 
    [U_PORF] ,
case when GroupMask= 1 then GroupMask End GroupMask ,
	DB_NAME() AS DB_NAME 
FROM [dbo].OACT

WHERE 
  [U_PORF]='Y' AND 
  frozenFor ='N' 
  AND Levels='4'

select 	
AcctCode,
	AcctName,
	U_PORF_Dep  OverCode,
	U_PORF_Alloc OverCode2, 
    [U_PORF] ,
case when GroupMask= 1 then GroupMask End GroupMask ,
	DB_NAME() AS DB_NAME 
FROM [dbo].OACT

WHERE 
  [U_PORF]='Y' AND 
  frozenFor ='N' 
  AND Levels='4'

body.value:
[[
{
"Timestamp" :"@{utcnow()}",
"Factory Name" :"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
"Pipeline Name" :"@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
"Pipeline Run Id" :"@{pipeline().RunId}",
"Activity Name" :"Mrr_@{pipeline().parameters.param_tableName} - Merge",
"Merge Activity - Insert" :@{if(
contains(activity('upsert').output,'firstRow'),
activity('upsert').output.firstRow.INSERT,
0)},
"Merge Activity - Update" :@{if(
contains(activity('upsert').output,'firstRow'),
activity('upsert').output.firstRow.UPDATE,
0)}
}
]

{

0)},
"Merge Activity - Update" :@{if(

activity('upsert').output.firstRow.UPDATE,
0)}
}
]

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
       [PrcCode]
      ,[PrcName]
      ,[DimCode]
      ,[U_Owner]
      ,[U_PorfApp]
      ,[U_OwnerMail]
      ,[U_Secondary]
      ,[U_SecMail]
      ,[U_PorfApp2]
      ,[Active]
      ,T0.[ValidTo]
      ,T0.u_porf
       ,DB_NAME() [DB_NAME]
 FROM [dbo].OPRC  t0 inner join [dbo].OACT T1 on t0.PrcCode= t1.U_PORF_Dep OR T0.PrcCode=T1.U_PORF_Alloc
 
 where Active <> 'N' AND T1.U_PORF='Y'
 GROUP BY 
     [PrcCode]
      ,[PrcName]
      ,[DimCode]
      ,[U_Owner]
      ,[U_PorfApp]
      ,[U_OwnerMail]
      ,[U_Secondary]
      ,[U_SecMail]
      ,[U_PorfApp2]
      ,[Active]
      ,T0.[ValidTo]
      ,T0.u_porf
